name: Dying Masters
description:
Dying Masters is a coop (2 - 4 players) action game where you have to coordinate with your teammates in order to defeat the dungeon's boss.

- Best performance and graphics on downloadble versions -

Game

The rules are simple:

  • Crashing yourself into the enemy will damage him but it also kills you
  • If all players are dead at the same time, you lose the game
  • If enemy life goes to zero and at least one player is alive, you win the game

There are also two play modes: Timer and Soul respawn modes. 

In Timer mode, when you die, you wait some time to respawn

In Soul mode, when you die, you drop your soul and a teammate needs to pick it up in order to respawn.

Considerations

This game was done for the Game Jam Argentina Online #1. The topic was: Dungeon. This game was created with cooperative gameplay in mind since it will be showcase in an event where all participants will play it and judge.

Only 2 players have configured controls for keyboard. In order to play with 3 or 4 players, all of them need a joystick. Also there is no single player mode so far, but any suggestion will be welcome.

Linux version wasn't tested, just built.
